$:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/Menu.text:
''Welcome to ~LeftBar''

Change this content by editing $:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/Menu

You can add tablists, aggregated lists or whatever you want.

You access the menu either by clicking the hamburger toggle or by simply hovering (or tapping) along the left screen edge. If you don't like this behaviour, you can change it in the //Controlpanel > Settings > LeftBar//
$:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/Menu.title: $:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/Menu

$:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/settings.text:
Content: Edit the [[LeftBar menu|$:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/Menu]]
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/Stylesheet" field="width" size=3/> ''Width'' for ~LeftBar
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/Stylesheet" field="display" checked="block" unchecked="none" default="blocked"/> ''Toggle button'' - display in left top menu
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/Stylesheet" field="position" checked="fixed" unchecked="absolute" default="fixed"/> ''Scroll vs Fix'' - behaviour when activated //via toggle button//
(The //hover-activated// content is always in fixed position.)
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/Stylesheet" field="hover-to-display-as" checked="block" unchecked="none" default="block"/> ''Hover to display'' - enable "hover window edge" to display pop-out
$:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/settings.title: $:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/settings
$:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/settings.caption: ~LeftBar

$:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/Stylesheet.text:
button.leftbar-toggle {
	position:fixed;
	z-index: 1200;
	display:{{!!display}};
	top:0px;
	left:0px;
	padding:0px;
	height:3em;
	width:2em;
}
.leftbar-toggle svg {
	<>
	fill: <>;
}
.leftbar-toggle:hover svg {
	fill: <>;
}
.leftbar-togglezone {
	position:fixed;
	z-index:200;
	left:0;
	top:3em;
	min-height:50vh;
	width:1em;
}
.leftbar-settingstable {
	margin:
	0 auto;
}
.leftbar-settingstable,
 .leftbar-settingstable td {
	border:0;
}
.leftbar-settingstable td:nth-of-type(1) {
	text-align:right;
	vertical-align:top;
}
.leftbar-content {
	position:{{!!position}};
	max-width:calc(42px + {{!!width}});
	left:0px;
	top:3em;
	padding:0em 10px 5px 10px;
	min-height:50vh;
	max-height:85vh;
	overflow-y:auto;
	z-index:201;
}
.leftbar-content .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {
	background-color: <>;
}
.leftbar-content .tc-tab-buttons button {
	background-color: <>;
}
.leftbar-togglezone .leftbar-content {
	display:none;
	position:fixed;
}
.leftbar-togglezone:hover .leftbar-content {
	display:{{$:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/Stylesheet!!hover-to-display-as}};
	background:<>;
	<>
 }

@media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
	.leftbar-content  {
		display:block;
		background:#f4f4f4;
		<>
		max-width:90vw;
	}
	button.leftbar-toggle {
		background:transparent;
		height:2em;
	}
	button.leftbar-toggle svg {
		background:white;
	}
	button.leftbar-toggle:hover {
		outline:2px solid lightgray;
		outline:2px solid <>;
	}
}
$:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/Stylesheet.title: $:/plugins/TWaddle/LeftBar/Stylesheet
